meanings.definition: A plant of the mustard family, typically with small white flowers and pungent leaves.
meanings.sent1: The cress in the garden had tiny white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy adding cress to my salads for a peppery flavor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns under the cress leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like cress, sharp and biting.
meanings.sent5: The cress leaves danced in the breeze, releasing a spicy scent.

meanings.definition: Any of various plants of the mustard family, used as salad greens.
meanings.sent1: The grocery store had a variety of cress for sale.
meanings.sent2: She tossed the cress with other greens for a fresh salad.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully juggled the cress before adding it to the dish.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were a mix of cress, adding a unique flavor to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant cress added a pop of color to the salad bowl.
